title: Spacious Family Apartment with Scenic Mountain Views and Modern Comforts
description: Step into this delightful 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment boasting a generous 95 sqm of living space, perfectly designed for family life and modern remote work needs. Enjoy an airy open-concept living area featuring energy-efficient windows and a cozy fireplace, ensuring year-round comfort and warmth. The inviting outdoors offers an expanded living experience with a dedicated barbecue zone and sheltered outdoor dining area, ideal for family gatherings. Your vehicle stays secure and dry in the underground garage while underfloor heating throughout provides an added touch of homey luxury.
neighborhood_description: Górna is a burgeoning neighborhood known for its inviting community feel and spectacular distant mountain views. With excellent access to public transport and well-maintained bike lanes, it's easy for families and professionals alike to explore the city or commute, while new cafes and local shops continue to appear as the area grows. Enjoy nearby green spaces for weekend adventures without giving up urban connectivity.
lifestyle_benefits: Quiet remote work possibilities with inspiring views
Easy access to city services and transport
Safe bicycle and walking paths for children
target_buyer: Ideal for growing families valuing comfort and connectivity or professionals working from home seeking more space and inspiring surroundings.
market_positioning: A sought-after, modern apartment in the up-and-coming Górna district, offering premium amenities and scenic views at a great value within Lodz’s competitive family apartment market.
